name: Cementis
goal:
Cementis is a Swiss based consultancy company specialised in cement industry. The company works mainly on sustainability strategy of the sector like clinker factor reduction and use of alternative fuel. Our aim is to help the industry reduce their CO2 impact.
Cementis is member of the (CTCN) Climate Technology Centre and Network.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives:
-the circular economy
- EU ETS phase IV & the free allowances
- Carbon leakage
- waste to energy
